generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance and curving slightly to the left.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb, and pedestrians can be seen walking on it.
- building: A large stone building with a prominent rose window and two towers is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Several trees are visible in the background, particularly on the right side of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Two pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A silver SUV is visible in the middle of the road, and a red car is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: Multiple traffic lights are visible, including one hanging above the road and others on poles at intersections.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a triangular "yield" sign, a pedestrian crossing sign, and a blue directional sign.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- rider: A person on a bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
